defense.Wiki: Attack power below this value is no damage

extRefTexId.Wiki: mAA / mAA_ ????. Tpf (-1 None) (AA Area number)

materialId.Wiki: Material ID. Treated the same as the floor material. When -1, the same behavior as before

animBreakIdMax.Wiki: What is the animation destruction ID from 0 to what?

isCamHit.Wiki: Does the camera hit (0 not hit, 1 hit)

isBreakByPlayerCollide.Wiki: Broken when the player touches (0 no, 1)

isAnimBreak.Wiki: Is it animation destruction (0 physical destruction, 1 animation destruction)

isPenetrationBulletHit.Wiki: Will the penetrating bullet hit (0 not hit, 1 hit)

isChrHit.Wiki: Does the character win (0 not hit, 1 hit)

isAttackBacklash.Wiki: Do you play the attack (0 do not play, 1 play)

isDisableBreakForFirstAppear.AltName: Is Disable Destruction on First Appearance
isDisableBreakForFirstAppear.Wiki: Broken at the initial appearance of the player (0 ru, 1 no)

isLadder.Wiki: Is it a ladder (0 different, 1 yes)

isAnimPauseOnRemoPlay.Wiki: Do you want to stop the animation during the poly play (0 not, 1 do)

isMoveObj.Wiki: Is it a moving object (0 different, 1 yes)

isAddRigidImpulse_ByDamage.AltName: Is Rigid Body affected by Damage Blow
isAddRigidImpulse_ByDamage.Wiki: Does the damage blow the rigid body (0 do not blow, 1 blow)

isBreak_ByChrRide.Wiki: Will it break if the character gets on (0 it won't break 1 it will break)

isBreakByEnemyCollide.Wiki: Broken when an enemy character touches (0 No, 1 Ru)

breakSfxId.Wiki: SFXID when destroying an object (-1 default (810030))

breakSfxCpId.Wiki: SFX generation position when the object is destroyed Damipoly ID (-1 placement position)

breakBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Action parameter of [bullet] at the time of destruction (-1 does not occur)

breakBulletCpId.Wiki: Location of [bullet] at the time of destruction Damipoli ID (-1 placement position)

breakFallHeight.Wiki: Height at which the object breaks when dropped (0 does not break when dropped)

camAvoidType.Wiki: What to do if an object blocks between the camera and player

breakStopTime.Wiki: Time from destruction to forced stop of rigid body (do not force stop at 0)

burnBraekRate.Wiki: Burnup threshold for switching to the ruptured state

burnSfxId.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion 0 (-1 No SFX)

burnSfxId_1.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion 1 (-1 No SFX)

burnSfxId_2.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion 2 (-1 No SFX)

burnSfxId_3.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion 3 (-1 No SFX)

burnBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning 0 (-1 does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_1.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning 1 (-1 does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_2.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning 2 (-1 does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_3.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning 3 (-1 does not occur)

burnBulletInterval.Wiki: Interval (frame) to generate bullets for spreading fire

navimeshFlag.Wiki: Navigation mesh flag set from the object

burnBulletDelayTime.Wiki: Time to delay the generation of bullets for fire spread (seconds)

burnSfxDelayTimeMin.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_1.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_2.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_3.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_1.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_2.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_3.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

BreakAiSoundID.Wiki: AI sound ID generated at the time of destruction

FragmentInvisibleWaitTime.Wiki: Material ID of debris (-1 Do not hide)

RigidPenetrationScale_Soft.Wiki: Rigid body soft contact setting Collision point distance coefficient [soft]

RigidPenetrationScale_Normal.Wiki: Rigid soft contact setting Collision point distance coefficient [Normal]

RigidPenetrationScale_Hard.Wiki: Rigid soft contact setting Collision point distance coefficient [hard]

LandTouchSfxId.Wiki: SFX ID at terrain contact (-1 offset by terrain material)

isDamageCover.AltName: Is Damage blocked after Passing Through
isDamageCover.Wiki: Whether to pass the damage to the other side when receiving damage (0 pass, 1 do not pass)

paintDecalTargetTextureSize.Wiki: Paint decal target size (only powers of 0 to 4096 2 allowed)

lifeTime_forDC.Wiki: Time until dynamically generated Obj disappears after generation (0 does not disappear)

clothUpdateDist.Wiki: Distance from the camera to update havokCloth (0 always update)

contactSeId.Wiki: SE ID to play when touched by a local player operated by you (-1 Do not play)

breakLandingSfxId.Wiki: Object material-dependent SFX identifier that regenerates when first landing after being destroyed (-1 does not occur)
